# accessibilityCustomActions()

**Instance Method**

Returns the custom actions of the current accessibility element.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityCustomActions() -> [NSAccessibilityCustomAction]?
```

## Assigning actions

- **setAccessibilityCustomActions(_:)**: Sets the custom actions of the current accessibility element.
- **NSAccessibilityCustomAction**: A custom action to perform on an accessible object.
